name: Tumble Ranger
description:
In Tumble Ranger, you have to jump from platform to platform to go as high as possible while avoiding everything that might kill you. Be fast and make the right decisions!

Have fun!

Features:
- 120 customized levels
- Unlock 10 unique colorful characters by collecting coins
- Make the best score by collecting fruits on your way
- A one-hand gameplay to play wherever you are
- Polished graphics bringing color in your life!
